Text:
1. Unrar the patch you want and the crack. 

2. Install the patch, if you want to use the US patch run the installer, 
if you want to use the European you have to copy/paste or move the contents to 
"C:\Program Files\Empire Interactive\Flatout 2" and overwrite. 

3. To install the crack copy/paste or move the cracked exe to 
"C:\Program Files\Empire Interactive\Flatout 2" and overwrite.

You don't have to mount anything, use winrar. http://www.rarlabs.com

It depends where you installed your flatout 2 game, if you can't remember use the search feature on your pc.
